attributes.action: Clamp down on uninsured motorists by allowing courts to give fines equivalent to the amount of insurance they should have paid.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should any law abiding citizen who pays for motor insurance be subsidising illegal drivers that are on the roads while uninsured.
We all pay for them through hiked up premiums.
Give them a fine at a cost of the years insurance they should have paid instead of the pathetic fines they are currently given.
Perhaps money generated in this way could be passed onto insurance companies thus reducing policy premiums for those that do pay their way.
